directions: Place oats in a blender and blend until a fine powder forms; add coconut milk beverage, banana, powdered peanut butter, and agave nectar. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup coconut milk beverage (such as Silk®)
3 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
title: Oatmeal PB and Banana Smoothie
